extends Object
    Text and parsing related utility methods.

    • Method Detail

      • parseDelimited

        public static String[] parseDelimited(String delimited,
                      char delimiter)
        Parameters:
        delimited - line of delimited text
        delimiter - delimiter to split fields on
        Returns:
        delimited strings, parsed according to RFC 4180 but with the given delimiter

      • parsePMMLDelimited

        public static String[] parsePMMLDelimited(String delimited)
        Parameters:
        delimited - PMML-style space-delimited value string
        Returns:
        delimited values, parsed according to PMML rules

      • joinDelimited

        public static String joinDelimited(Iterable<?> elements,
                   char delimiter)
        Parameters:
        elements - values to join by the delimiter to make one line of text
        delimiter - delimiter to put between fields
        Returns:
        one line of text, with RFC 4180 escaping (values with comma are quoted; double-quotes are escaped by doubling) and using the given delimiter

      • joinPMMLDelimited

        public static String joinPMMLDelimited(Iterable<?> elements)
        Parameters:
        elements - values to join by space to make one line of text
        Returns:
        one line of text, formatted according to PMML quoting rules (\" instead of "" for escaping quotes; ignore space surrounding values

      • joinPMMLDelimitedNumbers

        public static String joinPMMLDelimitedNumbers(Iterable<? extends Number> elements)
        Parameters:
        elements - numbers to join by space to make one line of text
        Returns:
        one line of text, formatted according to PMML quoting rules

      • parseJSONArray

        public static String[] parseJSONArray(String json)
                               throws IOException
        Parameters:
        json - line of JSON text
        Returns:
        delimited strings, the elements of the JSON array
        Throws:
        IOException - if JSON parsing fails

      • joinJSON

        public static String joinJSON(Iterable<?> elements)
        Parameters:
        elements - elements to be joined in a JSON string. May be any objects.
        Returns:
        JSON representation of the list of objects
